name: Helashruu
description: The Helashruu is characterized by its alien form and chaotic evil alignment, with notable physical traits including a strength score of 20 and immense size. It is capable of flight with a speed of 50 feet and has a rugged, natural armor.
memorable: This creature uniquely ensnares opponents with its Trap Life ability, creating a surreal display of the trapped victim on its surface.
goals: To dominate the battlefield using its power and keen intelligence, and trap foes for a prolonged attack.
relations: May serve or be encountered alongside other chaotic or evil aberrations.
environment: Typically found in dark, mysterious locations or other planes of existence.
strengths: High Constitution and Charisma scores lend to its durability and spellcasting capability, alongside its unique abilities like truesight.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to bludgeoning and thunder damage, which can be tactically exploited.
attacks: Utilizes its Shard Whip for melee attacks and can unleash waves of energy with Reflect Energy.
most_powerful_ability: Trap Life allows it to entrap a creature, blinding and restraining it while dealing damage over time.
senses: Possesses truesight up to 90 feet, allowing it to detect invisible creatures and effects.
skills: Highly skilled in perception with a +13 bonus, making it adept at noticing hidden threats.
additional_information: Can teleport as a free action up to 120 feet.
Innate spellcasting ability allows it to cast gate once per day.
Reflect Energy can deal significant damage based on the type it most recently suffered.
Immune to charming, paralysis, petrification, and prone effects.
Only one creature can be trapped at a time with Trap Life.
spellcasting: Innate spellcasting allows casting of gate once per day without material components.
test_queries: huge monster with truesight and teleportation
creature that traps foes with life siphon
powerful chaotic spellcaster with energy reflect
aberration with innate gate spell and energy attacks
